mapper.insert: insert into t_station_info(f_station_no, f_station_name, f_station_address, f_process_tech, f_process_scale, f_dev_ops_num, f_contact_tel, f_bg_image_path, f_remarks1, f_remarks2, f_remarks3) values (#{stationNo}, #{stationName}, #{stationAddress}, MD5(processTech), #{processScale}, #{devOpsNum}, #{connectTel}, #{bgImgPath}, #{remarks1}, #{remarks2}, #{remarks3})

insert into t_device(f_station_no, f_dev_no, f_var_list_fields, f_var_list_fields_md5, f_start_receive_time, f_end_receive_time) values (#{stationNo}, #{devNo}, #{varListFields}, MD5(f_var_list_fields), #{startReceiveTime}, #{endReceiveTime})
mapper.select: select f_dev_no as devNo, f_station_no as stationNo, f_dev_name as devName, f_dev_type as devType, f_dev_var_fields as devVarFields from t_device_info where f_station_no = #{stationNo}
